answers.answer: Completely worded that wrong my boyfriend is the babies father :)

He certainly won't need a whole day off to go to a doctor's appointment.Are you in an extremely high risk situation where it's important that he be there to hear information to make medical decisions?
I know he won't but they won't let him just take an hour off?
I am a high dependency case due to bleeding during this pregnancy and I have a high risk of getting gestational diabetes.. So I don't want to make all the decisions off my own back..

I don't know where he works or what is situation is,  but if they won't let him out the door for an hour then I think you should probably pick the 20 week scan for him to attend.  The 12 week one is not as interesting.Great for him that he's making more money,  and moving ahead.I don't know what your health situation is,  but you can tell him what happened at your 12 week scan and get a photo.Best wishes.  I always like a guy who is working hard.

Sorry,  our posts crossed.Can someone else you trust come with you?  I do understand that if you're afraid and anxious it's hard to get every nuance a doctor is talking about.It's unlikely you'll have to make many decisions on the spot,  though.Can you call him if there's a problem and have the doc speak to him on the phone?
Yeah that's a great idea I didn't think of that, I think we are just going to pay the fees of getting a 3/4d scan just to make up any scans he misses. Thank you so much for your help :)

question: My boyfriend and the babies dad has only just started a new job with higher pay. Due to this he has missed 3 doctors appointments and an emergency scan. The thing is I don't want him to miss the 12 week scan and the 20 week scan. If he took in letters to his work would they let him have these days off or would he have to take a sick day? Just it's not fair that he hasn't seen or heard anything since I found out we were expecting and he has a right to know the details and information the doctor is giving me about his baby? Surely this should go down as an appointment and not sick day? Just that he won't get any salary if he takes a sick day and we need all the money he gets. Some work just aren't understanding enough.
